faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: How do players join a quiz?
faq.a1: The host shares a group code. Players open the site, enter the code and they're in.
faq.q2: Is there a limit to questions?
faq.a2: Yes, the free plan has a limit. The Pro plan offers unlimited questions and data retention.
